com.feilong.core.util

Class SortUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.SortUtil

  • public final class SortUtil
extends Object
    专注于排序的工具类.

    说明:

    1. 该类的初衷之一,通常如果直接使用jdk里面的sort方法,比如 
       Arrays.sort(Object[])
      或者 
       Collections.sort(List)
      由于 这些方法是 void类型的,通常我们需要写2至3行代码
    2. 第二,该类对bean list的排序更加简单便捷
    Since:
    1.8.0
    Author:
    feilong

    • Method Detail

      • sort

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> T[] sort(T... arrays)
        对 数组 arrays 进行排序.

        以前代码需要写成:

         
 public static String toSalesPropertiesIdsJson(Long...itemPropertiesIdLongs){
     Arrays.sort(itemPropertiesIdLongs);
     return JsonUtil.format(itemPropertiesIdLongs, 0, 0);
 }
        现在可以重构成: 
         
 public static String toSalesPropertiesIdsJson(Long...itemPropertiesIdLongs){
     return JsonUtil.format(sort(itemPropertiesIdLongs), 0, 0);
 }
        再如: 
         
 // 得到默认分类,目前是最小的
 private Long getDefaultCategoryId(Long[] categoriesIds){
     Arrays.sort(categoriesIds);
     return categoriesIds[0];
 }
        可以重构成: 
         
 // 得到默认分类,目前是最小的
 private Long getDefaultCategoryId(Long[] categoriesIds){
     return sort(categoriesIds)[0];
 }
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        arrays - the arrays
        Returns:
        如果 array 是null,返回 empty array
        See Also:
        Arrays.sort(Object[])

      • sort

        public static <T> T[] sort(T[] arrays,
                           Comparator<? super T> comparator)
        对 数组 arrays使用 comparator 进行排序.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        arrays - the arrays
        comparator - the comparator
        Returns:
        如果 array 是null,返回 empty array
        See Also:
        Arrays.sort(Object[], Comparator)

      • sort

        public static <T extends Comparable<? super T>> List<T> sort(List<T> list)
        对 集合 list 进行排序.

        Collections.sort 底层就是调用的是 Arrays.sort

        示例:

         
 List<Integer> list = toList(5, 10, 3, 2);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(sort(list), 0, 0));
        返回: 
         [2,3,5,10]
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List)

      • sort

        public static <O> List<O> sort(List<O> list,
                               Comparator<? super O> comparator)
        对 集合 list,使用指定的 comparator 进行排序.

        示例:

         
 List<User> list = new ArrayList<User>();
 list.add(new User(12L, 18));
 list.add(new User(2L, 36));
 list.add(new User(5L, 22));
 list.add(new User(1L, 8));
 SortUtil.sort(list, new PropertyComparator<User>("id"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(list));
        返回: 
         [{
            "id": 1,
            "age": 8
        },
                {
            "id": 2,
            "age": 36
        },
                {
            "id": 5,
            "age": 22
        },
                {
            "id": 12,
            "age": 18
        }]
        当然对于上述示例,你可以直接调用: 
         SortUtil.sort(list, "id");
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        comparator - the comparator
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List, Comparator)

      • sort

        public static <O> List<O> sort(List<O> list,
                               String propertyName)
        对 集合 list,指定属性 propertyName 进行排序.

        示例:

         
 List<User> list = toList(//
                 new User(12L, 18),
                 new User(2L, 36),
                 new User(2L, 2),
                 new User(2L, 30),
                 new User(1L, 8));
 SortUtil.sort(list, "age");
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.formatWithIncludes(list, "id", "age"));
        返回: 
             [{
             "id": 2,
             "age": 2
         },
                 {
             "id": 1,
             "age": 8
         },
                 {
             "id": 12,
             "age": 18
         },
                 {
             "id": 2,
             "age": 30
         },
                 {
             "id": 2,
             "age": 36
         }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyNames 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyNames 是empty
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.propertyComparator(String), sort(List, Comparator)

      • sort

        public static <O> List<O> sort(List<O> list,
                               String... propertyNames)
        对 集合 list,指定属性(组合)进行排序.

        示例:

         
 List<User> list = new ArrayList<User>();
 list.add(new User(12L, 18));
 list.add(new User(2L, 36));
 list.add(new User(2L, 2));
 list.add(new User(2L, 30));
 list.add(new User(1L, 8));
 SortUtil.sort(list, "id", "age");
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.formatWithIncludes(list, "id", "age"));
        返回: 
            [{
                "id": 1,
                "age": 8
            },
                    {
                "id": 2,
                "age": 2
            },
                    {
                "id": 2,
                "age": 30
            },
                    {
                "id": 2,
                "age": 36
            },
                    {
                "id": 12,
                "age": 18
            }]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyNames - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyNames 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyNames 是empty ,或者有 null元素
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.chainedComparator(String...), ComparatorUtils.chainedComparator(java.util.Comparator...), sort(List, Comparator)

      • sortByFixedOrderPropertyValues

        @SafeVarargs
public static <O,V> List<O> sortByFixedOrderPropertyValues(List<O> list,
                                                                         String propertyName,
                                                                         V... propertyValues)
        对 集合 list,属性 propertyName 按照固定顺序值 propertyValues 进行排序.

        示例:

         
 User zhangfei = new User("张飞", 23);
 User guanyu = new User("关羽", 30);
 User liubei = new User("刘备", 25);
 List<User> list = toList(zhangfei, guanyu, liubei);
 
 List<User> select = CollectionsUtil.select(list, "name", "刘备", "关羽");
 Collections.sort(select, new PropertyComparator<User>("name", new FixedOrderComparator<>("刘备", "关羽")));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.formatWithIncludes(select, "name", "age"));
        此时你可以直接调用: 
         
 List<User> select2 = CollectionsUtil.select(list, "name", "刘备", "关羽");
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.formatWithIncludes(SortUtil.sortByFixedOrder(select2, "name", "刘备", "关羽"), "name", "age"));
        返回: 
            [{
                "age": 25,
                "name": "刘备"
            },
                    {
                "age": 30,
                "name": "关羽"
            }
        ]
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        propertyValues - the property values
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyName 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyName 是blank
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.propertyComparator(String, Object...), sort(List, Comparator)

      • sortByFixedOrderPropertyValues

        public static <O,V> List<O> sortByFixedOrderPropertyValues(List<O> list,
                                                           String propertyName,
                                                           List<V> propertyValues)
        对 集合 list,属性 propertyName 按照固定顺序值 propertyValues 进行排序.
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        propertyValues - the property values
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyName 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyName 是blank
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.propertyComparator(String, List), sort(List, Comparator)

      • sortByKeyAsc

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortByKeyAsc(Map<K,V> map)
        按照key asc顺序排序.

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<String, Comparable>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortByKeyAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a": 123,
 "b": 8,
 "c": 345
 }

        注意:

        由于排序使用的是 TreeMap.TreeMap(Map),而TreeMap是不允许 key是null, 如果传入的参数 map中,如果有key是null,那么将会抛出 NullPointerException

        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        否则直接构造 TreeMap返回
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil
        See Also:
        TreeMap.TreeMap(Map)

      • sortByKeyDesc

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortByKeyDesc(Map<K,V> map)
        按照key desc 倒序排序.

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<String, Comparable>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortByKeyDesc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "c": 345,
 "b": 8,
 "a": 123
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil
        See Also:
        ReverseComparator.ReverseComparator(Comparator), PropertyComparator.PropertyComparator(String), sort(Map, Comparator)

      • sortByValueAsc

        public static <K,V extends Comparable<V>> Map<K,V> sortByValueAsc(Map<K,V> map)
        根据value 来顺序排序(asc).

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<String, Comparable>();
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortByValueAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "b": 8,
 "a": 123,
 "c": 345
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil
        See Also:
        sort(Map, Comparator)

      • sortByValueDesc

        public static <K,V extends Comparable<V>> Map<K,V> sortByValueDesc(Map<K,V> map)
        根据value 来倒序排序(desc).

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new LinkedHashMap<String, Comparable>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortByValueDesc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "c": 345,
 "a": 123,
 "b": 8
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil
        See Also:
        sort(Map, Comparator)

      • sort

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sort(Map<K,V> map,
                                  Comparator<Map.Entry<K,V>> mapEntryComparator)
        使用 基于 Entry 的 mapEntryComparator 来对 map进行排序.

        由于是对Entry排序的, 既可以按照key来排序,也可以按照value来排序哦

        示例:

        比如有以下的map 
         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
 
 map.put("a13", 123);
 map.put("a2", 345);
 map.put("a8", 8);
        如果我们只是使用 : 
         LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortByKeyAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a13": 123,
 "a2": 345,
 "a8": 8
 }
        此时可以看出 a13是以字符串的形式进行比较的,我们可以使用以下的自定义的 Comparator,来达到排序的效果 
         PropertyComparator<Entry<String, Integer>> propertyComparator = new PropertyComparator<Map.Entry<String, Integer>>(
                 "key",
                 new RegexGroupNumberComparator("a(\\d*)"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sort(map, propertyComparator)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a2": 345,
 "a8": 8,
 "a13": 123
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        mapEntryComparator - 基于 Entry 的 Comparator
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        如果 mapEntryComparator 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List, Comparator)
